short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Convert website or app into editable wireframes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üéâ Our Chrome extension for MockFlow makes it incredibly easy to convert your existing website, web app, or internal apps into fully editable wireframes. With just a click, you can select any part or section or whole webpage and import it directly as your wireframe design. This saves time by letting you kickstart your wireframe journey from the designs you already have. Since it is fully editable, you can easily make changes to the designs and iterate it faster.


Our conversion features allows to:

* Import images as part of the wireframe (not included in Basic plan)
* Option to draw the imported webpage as a sketchy style wireframe
* Select and import only parts of the page.

This extension is brought to you for Free by MockFlow - the leader in wireframing software. If you really find this extension useful, please share on social media :-)  üëç
